title: Projects
text: I've lost count of the amount of projects I've worked on but here are some examples of my more recent ones. Unless otherwise stated I was responsible for all aspects of design and build for each project.

projects.title: EVO Home Services
projects.intro: High performing bespoke websites with the specific goal of going head-to-head with the competition in Google local searches.

projects.title: Dogs to Adopt
projects.intro: A website to help abandoned dogs find new homes by allowing users to search dog shelters in their area.

projects.title: ESO Builder
projects.intro: A companion web app to support The Elder Scrolls Online, a popular massively multiplayer online roleplaying game.

projects.title: VIP Dine
projects.intro: A brochureware website for a company that offers a low cost way for restaurants to take online reservations and food orders.
